agentAbility.name: EMP Rakete
agentAbility.description: Blitz loads a slow-moving missile into the gun of his vehicle. The missile can jam nearby opponents, and has detection capabilities that slow it down while it is close proximity of an enemy vehicle. The missile detonates with a delay shortly after coming into contact with an obstacle, or can be manually triggered, creating a large explosion.

primaryAttack.name: Single Shot
primaryAttack.description: Requires reload after each shot, most accurate when stationary.

tankAbilities.name: Deadzone Gerat
tankAbilities.description: Place poles on the map to create a deadzone in which opponents recieve debuffs. When the poles are destroyed, they release a shock which damages and stuns opponents.

tankAbilities.name: Vampyr Drone
tankAbilities.description: Deploy a drone capable of healing the Leopard 1A1B and allied vehicles, while also dealing Shock Damage to enemy vehicles. The player controls the drone's movement directing it as needed. Enemies can destroy the drone by dealing damage to it, and it is also susceptible to environmental damage from status effects and world effects.
